titles.title: A bill to provide for the meaningful participation of Taiwan in the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO).
A bill to provide for the meaningful participation of Taiwan in the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the Department of State, in coordination with the Department of Commerce, to initiate a U.S. plan to secure Taiwan's meaningful participation in the International Civil Aviation Organization.
